events.name: GAME_NAME
events.comment: Name of the game on the signalling server.

events.name: INSTANCE_NAME
events.comment: Name of the instance on the signalling server.

events.title: Initialization
events.description: Initializes world and user when they connect

children.text: Once we successfully connect to the signalling server, request to log in with the username entered on the login screen.

Once successfully logged in, request to join the room name the user entered on the login screen. Note the user's current alias is displayed back to them, because it's possible the signalling server changed our name if it was already taken.

parameters: "Logged in as '" & Multiplayer.MyAlias & "', joining room '" & RoomName & "'..."
"Joined the chat room as the host"
"Joined the chat room as a peer"

children.text: When someone joins the chat, log a message in the chat box and add them to the peer list on the right.
When someone leaves the chat, log a message in the chat box and remove them from the peer list on the right.
To remove the right name we check every item in the list, and remove the item index where the item text matches the name of the peer who left.
Log a message if we get kicked. This can happen if we could not connect to the host or if the host quit during the chat.

parameters: "Kicked (either could not connect to host or host quit)"

events.title: Common
events.description: Events that are common to both the host and peers.

children.title: Chat Log
children.description: A function to easily add a log message to the chat log textarea.

children.text: Since a lot of events need to add something to the ChatLog, this function saves us repeating the actions to add a new line to the end of the chat log and scroll to the bottom so we can still see updates even after they go past the object height.

events.title: Peer
events.description: Events specific to chat room peers (i.e. non-host users).

children.text: When we are a peer, we send our chat message to the host. The host will relay it to everyone else in the room.

parameters.value: Inventory.ItemIdByCords("Inventory_Miner", CanvasToLayerX("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY), CanvasToLayerY("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY))
Inventory.ItemIdByCords("Inventory_Miner", CanvasToLayerX("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY), CanvasToLayerY("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY))

events.title: Host
events.description: Events specific to the chat room host.

children.text: When we are the host, we immediately broadcast our own chat messages to everyone else in the room.

parameters.value: Inventory.ItemIdByCords("Inventory_Miner", CanvasToLayerX("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY), CanvasToLayerY("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY))
Inventory.ItemIdByCords("Inventory_Miner", CanvasToLayerX("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY), CanvasToLayerY("HUD", Mouse.AbsoluteX, Mouse.AbsoluteY))
